# Bibliotecas
```{r}
# remotes::install_github("rfsaldanha/microdatasus")
# library(microdatasus)
library(tidyverse)
# install.packages("tidyverse")
```

```{r}
sia_raw_amb <- fetch_datasus(
  year_start = 2021,
  month_start = 1,
  year_end = 2021,
  month_end = 12,
  uf = "AC",
  information_system = "SIA-PA"
)

head(sia_raw_amb)

sia_raw_amb |>
  count(AP_CIDPRI) |> 
  arrange(desc(n))  
  
  
```
```{r}
sia_raw_psic <- fetch_datasus(
  year_start = 2021,
  month_start = 1,
  year_end = 2021,
  month_end = 12,
  uf = "AC",
  information_system = "SIA-PS"
)

head(sia_raw_psic)

sia_raw_psic |> 
  count(CIDPRI) |> 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
```{r}
sia_raw_dom <- fetch_datasus(
  year_start = 2020,
  month_start = 1,
  year_end = 2020,
  month_end = 12,
  uf = "AC",
  information_system = "SIA-SAD"
```
